11.content: You're going to be, a male Pokemon? That's perfectly fine, but what Pokemon are you. What about starting off, with some old school Pokemon? How about Charmander, Squirtle, Pikachu, or perhaps even Bulbasuar. There are always plenty more to choose from, if you don't like any of these choices.
11.title: You're a Male Pokemon.

choices: The pokeball flies from your hand, as Charmander releases himself.
You throw the pokeball, out pops Squirtle?
111.content:
This was the big day; you were going to get, your very first Pokemon. You rush to the lab, overwhelmed with excitement. You made your choice the night before; you always wanted, to have a Charmander. You had always liked fire types, and a Charmander would be perfect. When you arrive at the lab, there is already a line.

You wait in line, hoping to get your Charmander. Luckily for you, Charmander hadn't been taken yet. You grab the pokeball; you pray that you had selected the one, that contains Charmander. You leave the lab, wanting a look at your new Pokemon. You get just outside of the city gates, before excitement overwhelms you. You have to see, your new Pokemon.
111.title: Getting your first Pokemon.

choices: You realize it can talk, and it asks you to free the princess.
1113.content:
The Pokemon that comes out of the ball is... Squirtle.
"What?!" You shout.
"Squuuuiirrrrrrr..." Says the Pokemon.
You ...
1113.title: You throw the pokeball, out pops Squirtle?

115.content: Here are some other choices.
115.title: Let me see, some other Pokemon.

choices: Ralts is about to shit on his face
Ralts is shitting on his chest
11511.content:
"I'm here, Professor!" I called. I'd been told that the professor needed to see me before I started out on my own. Everyone who goes on a journey, even one where they aren't battling, has to check in with a professor. Me? I'm just a breeder.
"Ah yes, there you are." said Professor Tree. "You're the one who studies pokemon breeding, right?" When I nodded, he continued. "Well, I know that you're not really a trainer, but we can't have you going out in the field without a pokemon." He gestured to a room just behind him. "I have a few that you can choose from back here."
I followed him into the room and before us were multiple pokemon. There were a few starters playing around together. In the center there were Pidgeys and Zigzagoons and a few other normal types napping. And off in the corner, the only one paying attention to me, was a Ralts. Even though I couldn't see it's eyes, I could feel them boring into me. I don't know why that compelled me to pick it, but at the time, something about it seemed perfect.
"I want that Ralts." I told him. It shuffled over to me when I mentioned it.
"Are you sure? He's been returned a few times already. Apparently he did strange things while his trainers were asleep." the Professor said.
Ralts tugged on my pants leg and I picked it up. It chirped happily. "I'm sure."
The professor sighed and agreed. After giving me a few supplies he sent me off, but because it was already 8 pm, I decided that we would go home and I would start my journey the next day. My ultimate goal is to get to the Breeder college, but in order to do that I have to pass exams at a bunch of different schools. It's kind of like the pokemon league but boring. Ralts didn't have any problems with that not having to battle, though.
I live alone, so it was just me and Ralts there, getting to know eachother. I learned that because Ralts had already had trainers before me, it already knew Confusion and Teleport, but it didn't know anything else. Ralts learned that I hadn't had a pokemon since my father left and took his pokemon with him.

Soon it was time for bed if we wanted to get an early start the next day. I let Ralts sleep in my bed with me, since it wasn't too big and this would be the last chance I got to sleep in my bed for a while. Of course when I got woken up at three in the morning, I realized what Professor Tree meant by "strange things".
11511.title: Ralts

info.brief_description: A scat story. As you guessed it, this time, it's Pokemon!
info.description:
I wanted to make my own Pokemon story after all the others had issues with character choice or just bad grammar. So here's my attempt. Let's hope it's popular!

Some base rules:
1. I'll allow both male and female characters.
2. Remain consistent. Don't change a mon's gender between chapters just because you wanted to.
3. During choices (As in, picking between different mons), don't leave it at 2 mons. Try to leave open choices in case no one else finds your selections attractive.
4. Good grammar is a must.
5. I don't need an essay, but try to write a little more than 2 sentences for an entry.
6. This story is in first person, so it's "You".
7. The Pokemon will be doing the shitting.
8. Other than yourself, try to keep human characters to a minimum.
9. Sex is allowed.
10. More rules as they become necessary.
